= Introduction =

In this case a destination creation is being tested. The name is TEST.TES:

{{{

@JMSIntegrationConfigurationTest(connector = "tcp://localhost:61667", jmx = "false")

public class EmbeddedJMSIntegrationTest extends AbstractJMSIntegrationTest {

	public void testDestinationCreation() {
		testDestinationCreation("TEST.TEST", "tcp://localhost:61667");		
	}
}
